bauddha katayuthu departhamenthuwa ha samastha lanka shasanarakshaka mandalaya warshikawa sanwidhanaya kara pawathwanu labana daham pasal sisu nipunatha agayim wadasatahane palamu adiyara wana pradeshiya sisu nipunatha agayima pasugiya sapthambar masa 29 wana dina rata pura madhyasthana 318 di daham pasal daru dariyan 408720 ge sahabhagithwayen itha sarthakawa pawathwana ladi.ema adiyara yatathe sudusukam lada daham pasal daru dariyan 12720 k samastha lanka daham pasal disthrik sisu nipunatha agayim sandaha nowambar masa 03 wana dina peni sitimata niyamithaya.perawaru 8.30 sita pawathwena ema agayim wadasatahana disthrikka 19k aawaranaya wana paridi sidu karanu labana athara meyin palamu sthanaya himikaraganna daru dariyan 840 k desambar masa kagalla balika widyalaya ha kagalla santha josap widyala parishrayanhidi pawathwena samastha lanka daham pasal sisu nipunatha agayim wadasatahana sandaha sudusukam labana bawa bauddha katayuthu komasaris janaral chandrapema gamage mahatha niwedanaya karayi.

engalantha danga pandu yawana kridaka gram swon ohuge krida diwiye prathama wathawata loka ekdina krikat shrenigatha kirimwala anka 1 pandu yawanna bawata pathwa siti.shri lankawata erehi tharagamalawedi engalanthayata 3 – 2ka jayagrahanayak wartha kirimata upakari wu swonge kadulu 8 nisa ohu shrenigatha kirimwala mudunata piwisa aththe 2009 wasare sapthambaraye sita ema sthanaye randi siti nawasilantha wamath danga pandu yawana daniyal wetori abhibawa yamini.2004 wasare agosthuwedi tika kalayakata stiw hamisan shrenigatha kirim layisthuwe ihalatama nagimen pasuwa, oonama aakarayaka krikat kridawe lowa shrenigatha kirimwala anka 1 ta piwisi palamu engalantha pandu yawanna swon weyi.
